overview:
Venture capitalist and private equity investor specializing in developing and funding high-growth oriented technology businesses, typically in Minnesota.

Mr. Dalvey has over 32 collective years of corporate board experience with 12 years engaged with public, SEC regulated companies spanning over 100 individual transactions valued over $1.8 billion across a wide variety of industries, stages and investment size.

Prior board roles include Definity Health Inc., AppTec Laboratory Services Inc., chf Solutions Inc., Gentra Systems Inc., and Agiliti, Inc. as well as publically-traded companies Navarre Corporation (Nasdaq: NAVR), NatureVision (Nasdaq: NRVN), Digitilti (Nasdaq: DIGI), August Technology (Nasdaq: AUGT), Health Fitness Corporation (Nasdaq: HFIT).
